definition: Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail
role/character in a novel/persona/also pr. [jiao3 se4]

sentences.english: Her corn-coloured ringlets hung gaily about her face.
sentences.chinese: 她的玉米色的鬈发妩媚地挂在她的脸上。

sentences.english: Color symbol, the blue symbolizes joy and win loyal to our motherland.
sentences.chinese: 色象征欢乐和胜利，蓝色象征忠于祖国。

sentences.english: Found Red garments have two different thread color.
sentences.chinese: 发现红色成品有两种不同缐色。

sentences.english: Showing color and sky is do not hinder and identical.
sentences.chinese: 说明了色和空是不相碍而相同的。

sentences.english: Sets the pix el at the specified point to the closest approximation of the specified color.
sentences.chinese: 设置指定点像素为最接近指定色的近似值。

sentences.english: Surrender to shine with this shimmering coral-pink.
sentences.chinese: 我愿臣服在妳的珠光珊瑚色裙摆下。
我超爱龟甲色的眼镜框。

sentences.english: Behind is the bright blue and light of a cloud-scudded sky.
sentences.chinese: 湛蓝色的天空飘着片片白云。

sentences.english: Adds silvery brightness to gray hair and neutralizes brassy tones in all shades.
sentences.chinese: 中和所有颜色秀发的黄铜色，增加灰发的光泽。

sentences.english: A change came over Cronshaw's placid round face.
sentences.chinese: 克朗肖的平静的圆脸一下子变了色。

sentences.english: Copper sky, shadows rise, bridge of sighs.
sentences.chinese: 红铜色的天空，阴影出现，叹息桥。

sentences.english: This raspberry color looks too rich.
sentences.chinese: 这个覆盆子色看起来太艳了。

sentences.english: All Japanese pork chop specialist will have you ground your own sesame to make the sauce.
sentences.chinese: 所有日色猪扒店都会要你自己磨芝麻做酱料。

sentences.english: The butter is the fat which in the milk refines, the color and the taste similar edible butter.
sentences.chinese: 酥油是牛奶中提炼出来的脂肪，色与味类似食用黄油。

sentences.english: China has now become the largest producer and exporter of glazes and pigments in the world.
sentences.chinese: 中国已成为世界上最大的色釉料生产国和出口国。

sentences.english: Deep garnet to black with a garnet hue.
sentences.chinese: 深红近黑色里略带石榴色的红韵。
